data.title: Sebastian Eaton - 2021-22 - Men's Track and Field
data.meta_description:
Sebastian EatonSprints  - Indoor 60m • 7.29 • Angry Birds Challenge • Lehigh • 2018
Outdoor 100m • 11.25 • Atlantic 10 Championships • George Mason • 2018
Indoor
data.text:
Indoor 60m • 7.29 • Angry Birds Challenge • Lehigh • 2018

Outdoor 100m • 11.25 • Atlantic 10 Championships • George Mason • 2018

Indoor 200m • 22.66 • Penn 8-Team Select • Ocean Breeze • 2019

Outdoor 200m • 22.30 • Atlantic 10 Championships • George Mason • 2018

Indoor 300m • 36.82 • Jack Pyrah Invitational • Haverford • 2017

Indoor 400m • 49.29 • John Thomas Terrier Classic • Boston • 2020

Outdoor 400m • 50.12 • Larry Ellis Invitational • Princeton • 2018

(PRs updated March 11, 2020)

IC4A

2020 IC4A Indoor Championships: 4x400m Relay (First Leg), 16th

2020 IC4A Indoor Championships: 400m, 26th

2018 IC4A Outdoor Championships All-East Team: 4x100m Relay, 8th

2018 IC4A Indoor Championships: 4x400m Relay, 14th

Atlantic 10

2018 Atlantic 10 Outdoor Championships Scoring Performance: 4x100m Relay, 7th

Outdoor 2020: Season canceled due to COVID-19.

Indoor 2019-20: Ran on five 4x400m relay groups, including the first leg of the 16th-place 4x4 (3:18.56) at the IC4A Championships... Also raced the 400m (49.60) for 26th at IC4As... Ran second leg of SJU's fastest 4x4 (3:18.54) of the season, which placed seventh at the John Thomas Terrier Classic up at Boston... Ran the first leg on the third-place 4x4 (3:21.03) at the Fastrack National Invitational... Raced the 200m three times in the early season, going for fourth place at the Frank Colden Invitational (22.91) and turning in a season-best time (22.70) at the Penn State Nittany Lion Challenge... Raced the 400m four times in the latter part of the season, going for a collegiate-best time of 49.29 at the John Thomas Terrier Classic and placing 13th (51.92) at the Atlantic 10 Championships.

Outdoor 2019: Competed in the 200m (24.98) at the Atlantic 10 Outdoor Track and Field Championships, placing 28th… Placed third in the 200m (22.61) at the Rider 5-Way… Ran on the third-place 4x100m relay (42.52) at the Rider 5-Way Meet.

Indoor 2018-19: Competed at the IC4A Indoor Track and Field Championships, running on the eighth-place 4x400m relay and the 14th-place DMR… Competed in the Atlantic 10 Indoor Track and Field Championships… Recorded a personal-best time in the 200m (22.66), placing seventh at the Penn 8-Team Select… Earned a personal-best time in the 400m (50.69) at the Penn 8-Team Select.

Outdoor 2018: Ran on the 4x100m relay (41.56) at the IC4A Outdoor Track and Field Championships, placing eighth… Competed on the 4x100m relay and in the 100m and 200m at the Atlantic 10 Outdoor Track and Field Championships, placing seventh, 14th, and 14th, respectively…Recorded a personal-best time in the 400m (50.12) at the Larry Ellis Invitational, placing 23rd… Ran the second leg of the first-place 4x100m relay (41.92) at the Rider Invitational… Ran the third leg of the first-place 4x100m relay (42.62) at the Rider 5-Way Meet.

Indoor 2017-18: Ran at the IC4A Indoor Track and Field Championships on the 4x400m relay (3:23.12), placing 23rd in the event… Ran the 400m (52.25) at the Atlantic 10 Indoor Track and Field Championships, placing 16th… Ran on the second-place DMR (10:17.33) at the Fastrack National Invite… Recorded a personal-best in the 60m (7.29) at the Lehigh Angry Birds Challenge, placing 10th.

High School/Personal: 2017 New Hampshire Division 2 state champion in the indoor 55m, indoor 300m, outdoor 100m, outdoor 200m, and outdoor 4x400m relay at Trinity High… 2017 All-State selection and led squad to a pair of state titles at Trinity High… 2016 New Hampshire Division 2 state champion in the indoor 300m, outdoor 100m, outdoor 200m, and outdoor 400m at Souhegan High… 2016 All-State selection and led squad to a state title at Souhegan High… 2016 New Hampshire Boys’ Track Gatorade Player of the Year… Earned six varsity letters… Father, Charles, played baseball at American University… Majoring in theatre and film.
